title: rlm_map_reduce Input
description: Input schema for the rlm_map_reduce MCP tool

plan_id.description: ID of a previously generated plan to execute

task.description: Task description (if not using a plan_id)

map_prompt.description: Prompt template for the map phase

reduce_prompt.description: Prompt template for the reduce phase

budget.description: Resource budget (if not using a plan_id)

include_intermediate.description: Include intermediate map results in output
